DOC.brief_summary: The object of this study was to evaluate the accuracy and safety of the Tirobot system.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial for the Application of Tirobot System
DOC.detailed_description: Tirobot system is a new-type medical robot-assisted surgery system that designed for spine and traumatic orthopaedic surgeries. This system has been certified by CE. The accuracy and safety of pedicle screw placement using this system will be evaluated.
DOC.criteria: traumatic or degenerative thoracolumbar disease required for pedicle screw fixation surgery severe osteoporosis old thoracolumbar fracture deformity of pedicle combined with coagulation disorders combined with other systematic disease
